Daily Skin Care Routine.title: Morning Cleanser
Daily Skin Care Routine.description: Use a gentle cleanser to wash away oils.

Daily Skin Care Routine.title: Sunscreen
Daily Skin Care Routine.description: Use sunscreen every day to protect your skin.

Daily Skin Care Routine.title: Night Cream
Daily Skin Care Routine.description: Apply nourishing night cream before bed.

Makeup Tips.title: Blending Technique
Makeup Tips.description: Blend your foundation smoothly for a natural look.

Makeup Tips.title: Remove Makeup
Makeup Tips.description: Always remove makeup before going to bed.

Natural DIY Beauty Tips.title: Honey Face Mask
Natural DIY Beauty Tips.description: Use honey as a face mask for natural glow.

Natural DIY Beauty Tips.title: Cucumber for Eyes
Natural DIY Beauty Tips.description: Place cucumber slices on eyes to reduce puffiness.

Product Usage Tips.title: Use Non-Comedogenic Products
Product Usage Tips.description: Choose products that won’t clog pores.

Product Usage Tips.title: Patch Test
Product Usage Tips.description: Always do a patch test before using a new product.

Hygiene Tips.title: Clean Brushes Regularly
Hygiene Tips.description: Clean your makeup brushes weekly to avoid bacteria.

Hygiene Tips.title: Change Pillowcases
Hygiene Tips.description: Change your pillowcases often to prevent breakouts.
